Title: Nude Nuns with Big Guns
Writer: Joseph Guzman, Robert James Hayes II
Actors: Asun Ortega, David Castro, Perry D'Marco, Maxie Santillan Jr.
Plot: Mentally abused, enslaved and coerced into prostitution, a left-for-dead merciless Sister will take on a mission straight from God, whacking sinners in a strictly personal, no-prisoners vigilante Holy War.
